nodes.text: The Luj system was a star system that was located within the Outer Rim Territories' Tamarin sector. The system shared its name with Luj City, a settlement on the Tharin sector planet Novor 23.
The Luj system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square N-19.
